Articles.Content:
Here's a simple idea I had for a forum game.

**Poster 1** will type a series of random letters, a la [Convert Random Letters to a Sentence](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111192-Convert-Random-Letters-to-a-Sentence%21).

**Poster 2** will then define how to pronounce that word, and what that word means. They also post another series of letters to keep the game going.

**Rules:**

1. Follow all forum rules!

2. No using pre-made words of any language.

3. Use a series of letters with a MAXIMUM of about 30 characters, please.

4. Have fun!

EXAMPLE

**Poster 1:** jiancas

**Poster 2:** JEE-an-cas. It's a noun, a type of foreign dancer. iuasd

Here's the first series of letters!

---

**iutghn**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T14:49:46Z" title="04/29/2015 02:49  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by Maximus97**

ee-oo-t-gh-un: verb; running at a slow pace

lauyfeirh

[Laoo-ee-fi-ere]: Adjective; insufficient. To not be complete or to not satisfy one's needs.

Malore

Muh-Lore - To admire; Praising/Commending

Ernalities

Noun [Ehr-na-li-tees]

Plural of Ernality; A misbehaving singularity; A singularity with sass

puondugre

[PÃƒÅ¡-aun-doe-grey]: Adjective; Of interest. To be, or to draw a center of attention.

Jucomodso

[JUK-oh-mod-so] Noun, a tropical fruit.

mcauhs

[EM-caoo-hus] Verb, the act of eating coconut while riding an emu.

qptyxw

[KPT-yksw] Noun, the word for a confusing word; basically, it describes itself.

ifwehuf

[EEF-wuf] Noun, a dog from Yavin 4.

jiuhlau

[schI-uh-louw] A surname [Very rare: Popularity rank in the U.S.: #00101]

Idakot

[Eye-duh-kot] Noun, an exotic type of potato found in ireland.

Ujiklo

[yoo-JIK-lo] Noun, a type of bladed weapon found in fake history stores and costume shops.

aucnxc

[uh-ik-lo] adjective

A word used to describe when someone prtends to be happy in an event that may cause shock

EX. Jeb was just plain happy, even though his joint rocket was plummeting towards the ground, however some people debate that he is just Ujiklo.

Waket

[edit] ninja'd

[Whack-it] Verb, to hit your monitor with a baseball bat.

koraihfalikartalpirara

[Kore-uh-ife-alike-art-Alpee-ray-ra] Noun. An old secluded lake in Mesopotamia. It has long since dried.

Sesedik

[sea-seed-eek] Noun. An oceanic secession. 

Tercimib

[TUR-sim-ib] Noun, a simulation of stool.

ghdfds

[gud-fuds] Noun, a Kerbal snack brand.

aciubn

ah-kyoo-bin

noun

Similar to acupuncture, except it occurs in a bin.

aaa

[Aaa] Onomatopoeia. A response to when you feel a startling emotion in large doses.

Vehwalo

[i'm not actually making up words. These all have literal translations in Sigma language; one that very, very few know how. I only know 2 others]

[Ve-HW-alo] Noun, the name of an ancient intergalactic empire.

Hilkordintiriddiolopiaconifirocouciouposicusinus.

Hilko-riden-tiri-diddo-lo-panco-ifer-cocouci-posic-in-us

The name of a veeery rare bacteria discovered up chuck norrises nasal passage.

djsahdvsakl (I don't want anyone else to have to go through making a pronounciation for another MASSIVE word-thing)

Dee-yah-zakl

The name of a famous Kerbal dish.

Jjefoiofnoi.

Geef-Oi-Fy-No

Noun: The bottom hole on the power outlet, below the middle on the other pronge holes.

Essderyuim
